Description: Motor velocity at the time the error was detected.
Reading this parameter copies the entire entry for
the detected error (error class, time of detection of
error, ...) to an intermediate memory from which
the elements of the detected error can then be
In addition, the read pointer of the error memory is
automatically set to the next error entry.
This entry contains additional information on the
detected error, depending on the error number.
